content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Yeah, I need a plumber. But nothing ever goes right with these companies.
I'm sorry you've had trouble in the past. I'll do my best to make this as easy as possible! May I have your name so I can get started scheduling your plumbing service?
It's Bob. But don't mess this up like everyone else does, okay?
Thank you, Bob. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm service availability and offer the best scheduling options?
219 Maple Ave. Just so you know, last time someone said they'd show up and never did.
Thank you for the address, Bob. I'll do my best to make sure everything stays on track. May I ask what specific plumbing issue you are experiencing?
Sink is leaking. Probably needs a new pipe or something. Can you tell me how much this is going to cost? I don't want any surprises.

I understand cost is important. While I can offer a general range, final pricing depends on exactly what's needed. Would you like a rough estimate, or would you like to schedule a technician for an in-person quote?
I don't know, if it's more than like 50 bucks I can't do it. You guys always overcharge. Why can't anyone just show up on time and not rip people off?

I understand your concern, Bob. Most minor leaks tend to start at a service fee of around $79, which covers diagnosis and usually basic repairs. If itâ€™s something more complicated, we always explain before doing additional work. Would you like to go ahead and set up a time for an inspection, or would you prefer to wait?
That's more than I want to spend. Why does it cost so much? I'm not paying that unless I'm 100% sure you show up and don't waste my morning.

I completely understand. We take punctuality seriously and always communicate before arrival. We can also text you when the technician is on their way. If you'd like to proceed, can you let me know your ideal day and time for a visit?
I work weird hours, sometimes I'm home in the morning but it totally depends. Honestly, nevermind. I'm just going to try to fix it myself.
reason: Customer declined due to price & reliability concerns
